descriptionMarkdown:
Small infinite kovarex loop with logic.


How to setup: 

* paste it via bots and keep it unpowered until the setup is done
* put exatly 40 U-235 in the steel chest
*put as much U-238 as you like in the chest, maybe link it to transport belt
*copy and paste it, beacon it, take U-235 freely from wood chest, replace crappy wood chest
*power it up

Additional Hint: during the kovarex process all of the U-235 will be in the Centrifuge. Therefore an unrestricted inserter will at some point fill the chest with U-238 and block the U-235 loop. If you know nothing about logic, just fill the chest with some U-238 manually. You wont have to worry about it for a long time. If you want to do it properly,i suggest you try to find out how to restrict your inserter to only put a little U-238 in the chest. It is quite easy. Search for "Limit items placed into a chest" under
https://wiki.factorio.com/Tutorial:Circuit_network_cookbook#Limit_items_placed_into_a_chest
title: Kovarex 5x5 small
